page.title: 05TRELOAR COLLEGE (FROYLE)
page.content:
This College moved from Alton to Froyle in 1953. It is{independent, {for physically handicapped children, and the Froyle buildings until recently catered for all the boys with workshops for tailoring, shoemaking and radio repairs. In 1965 a new school was built at Holybourne for girls, Florence Treloar School, but in recent years both schools have been amalgamated with a 'Lower School' in the Froyle buildings and an 'Upper School' in the Holybourne buildings, whose older pupils attend the Alton Sixth Form College.
There is also a Churh of England Aided Primary School in Holybourne.
